This exchange is from the 1983 movie The Return of the Living Dead.
Harry Cooper: Did you hear me when I told you they turned over our car?
Ben: Oh, hell! Any good five men could do that!
Harry Cooper: Thats my point! Theres not going to be five, or even ten! Theres going to be twenty, thirty, maybe a hundred of those things, and as soon as they find out were here, this placell be crawling with them!
